fields.name: txtAddonSelection

fields.name: txtNoMainProductsValidation
fields.fieldText: Cannot add an Add-on because no main products have been added to this opportunity yet, and {!Get_This_Opportunity.Account.Name} does not have any main products on an active contract.

fields.name: txtNoAddons
fields.fieldText: There are no Add-Ons or Services for the product you selected.

fields.name: txtQuantityLocked
fields.fieldText: The quantity is locked for the product you edited.

fields.name: txtDuplicateSKU
fields.fieldText: The SKU(s) you selected has already been added to the Opportunity. Duplicate SKUs cannot be added.

fields.fieldText: Please select a pricing type.

fields.name: txtDeletingAllOpportunitySKUs
fields.fieldText:
You are removing all Opportunity SKUs from the Opportunity below. Do you want to close the Opportunity or keep it open to add more products to it?


Opportunity: {!varOpportunityWithDeletedSKUs.Name}

Stage: {!varOpportunityWithDeletedSKUs.StageName}

fields.name: txtBrandAlreadySelected
fields.fieldText: A {!Brand} SKU has already been added to this Opportunity. Check the box below to remove the current {!Brand} SKU before clicking "Add Item."

fields.name: txtDiscountLimitExceeded
fields.fieldText: The maximum discount allowed for the selected promotion is {!varMaxDiscount}%.

fields.name: txtDiscountLocked
fields.fieldText: The discount % is locked for this promotion.

fields.name: txtNoPromosAvailable
fields.fieldText: No short-term promotions are available.

fields.name: txtNoLifetimePromosAvailable
fields.fieldText: No lifetime promotions are available.

screens.name: Short_Term_Promo_Already_Exists_Screen
screens.label: Short Term Promo Already Exists Screen

fields.name: txt_ShortTermPromoAlreadyExists
fields.fieldText: A short-term promotion is already added to the Opportunity. Please remove the existing promotion before adding a new promotion.
